trans-unit.source: Provides a simple list of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 提供委派 (Delegate) 的簡單清單。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用線性搜尋演算法來尋找項目清單中的委派。

trans-unit.source: A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用大量的項目時，線性搜尋演算法沒有效率。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries is slow.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您有大型的清單，尋找項目會變慢。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>, see [How to: Handle Multiple Events Using Event Properties](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-handle-multiple-events-using-event-properties.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>，請參閱[如何： 處理多個事件使用事件屬性](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-handle-multiple-events-using-event-properties.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that owns the event.
trans-unit.target: 擁有事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to add to the list.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至清單的委派。

trans-unit.source: Adds a delegate to the list.
trans-unit.target: 將委派加入清單。

trans-unit.source: The list to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的清單。

trans-unit.source: Adds a list of delegates to the current list.
trans-unit.target: 將委派清單加入目前清單內。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the delegate list.
trans-unit.target: 處置委派清單。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>讓它所佔用的記憶體可由記憶體回收收回。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: 否則，資源<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>是使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList>物件的解構函式。

trans-unit.source: An object to find in the list.
trans-unit.target: 要在清單中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delegate for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定物件的委派。

trans-unit.source: The delegate for the specified key, or <see langword="null" /> if a delegate does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引鍵的委派，如果委派不存在，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When the key is not found in the list and you provide a delegate to set the value of the key, then the key is added to the top of the list and assigned to the delegate as its value.
trans-unit.target: 當清單中找不到索引鍵並提供委派設定的值的索引鍵，然後金鑰加入至清單頂端，並指派給委派，做為其值。

trans-unit.source: The object that owns the event.
trans-unit.target: 擁有事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to remove from the list.
trans-unit.target: 要從清單移除的委派。

trans-unit.source: Removes a delegate from the list.
trans-unit.target: 將委派從清單移除。
